## Installation

You can install the released version of tester from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("tester")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("threadingdata/tester")
```

## A basic example

```{r example}
library(tester)
## basic example code
```

# Say Hello!

```{r hello}
hello('You sight for sore eyes')
```

# Say Goodbye!

```{r goodbye}
goodbye('You filthy animal')
```
